description: From elder +‎ -ship. The Lithuanian sense is a calque of Lithuanian seniūnija.

entries.meaning: Seniority; the state or condition of being older.
The position or office of being an elder.
examples: When I came first to Caulds I sought to prevail upon him to accept the eldership, but he aye put me by, and when I heard his tale I saw that he had done wisely.

entries.meaning: The smallest administrative division in Lithuania, equivalent to a ward.
